% Dynamic predicates from resources (auto-generated by Python script)
:- dynamic agent/1.
:- dynamic ll_arm/1.
:- dynamic ll_gripper/1.

% This file was automatically generated by the LLM system
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% kb
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% Positions
pos(0,0).
pos(1,1).
pos(2,2).

% Blocks
block(b1).

% Agents
agent(a1).

% Arms
ll_arm(a1).

% Grippers
ll_gripper(a1).

% Resources
resources(agent(_)).
resources(ll_arm(_)).
resources(ll_gripper(_)).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% init
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
init_state([
        ontable(b1),
        at(b1,1,1),
        clear(b1),
        available(a1),
        ll_arm_at(a1,0,0),
        ll_gripper(a1,open)
    ]
).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% goal
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
goal_state([
        ontable(b1),
        at(b1,2,2),
        clear(b1),
        available(a1),
        ll_arm_at(a1,2,2),
        ll_gripper(a1,open)
    ]
).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% actions
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% Move a block from (X1,Y1) to another position on the table at (X2,Y2)
action(move_table_to_table(Agent, Block, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [agent(Agent), block(Block), pos(X1, Y1), pos(X2, Y2)],
  [available(Agent), ontable(Block), at(Block, X1, Y1), clear(Block)],
  [
    del(available(Agent)),
    add(available(Agent)),
    del(ontable(Block)),
    del(at(Block, X1, Y1)),
    del(clear(Block)),
    add(at(Block, X2, Y2)),
    add(clear(Block))
  ]
).

% Move a block from (X1,Y1) to the top of another block at (X2,Y2)
action(move_table_to_block(Agent, Block1, Block2, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [agent(Agent), block(Block1), block(Block2), pos(X1, Y1), pos(X2, Y2)],
  [available(Agent), ontable(Block1), at(Block1, X1, Y1), clear(Block1), at(Block2, X2, Y2), clear(Block2)],
  [
    del(available(Agent)),
    add(available(Agent)),
    del(ontable(Block1)),
    del(clear(Block1)),
    del(at(Block1, X1, Y1)),
    add(on(Block1, Block2)),
    add(at(Block1, X2, Y2)),
    add(clear(Block1)),
    add(clear(Block2))
  ]
).

% Move a block from the top of a block to a position on the table
action(move_onblock_to_table(Agent, Block1, Block2, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [agent(Agent), block(Block1), block(Block2), pos(X1, Y1), pos(X2, Y2)],
  [available(Agent), on(Block1, Block2), clear(Block1), at(Block1, X1, Y1), at(Block2, X1, Y1)],
  [
    del(available(Agent)),
    add(available(Agent)),
    del(clear(Block1)),
    del(on(Block1, Block2)),
    del(at(Block1, X1, Y1)),
    add(ontable(Block1)),
    add(at(Block1, X2, Y2)),
    add(clear(Block1)),
    add(clear(Block2))
  ]
).

% Move a block from the top of a block to another block
action(move_onblock_to_block(Agent, Block1, Block2, Block3, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    [agent(Agent), block(Block1), block(Block2), block(Block3), pos(X1, Y1), pos(X2, Y2)],
    [available(Agent), on(Block1, Block2), clear(Block1), at(Block1, X1, Y1), at(Block2, X1, Y1), at(Block3, X2, Y2), clear(Block3)],
    [
        del(available(Agent)),
        add(available(Agent)),
        del(clear(Block1)),
        del(clear(Block3)),
        del(on(Block1, Block2)),
        del(at(Block1, X1, Y1)),
        add(on(Block1, Block3)),
        add(at(Block1, X2, Y2)),
        add(clear(Block1)),
        add(clear(Block2))
    ]
).


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% ll_actions
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
ll_action(ll_move_arm_start(Arm, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [ll_arm_at(Arm, X1, Y1)],
  [ll_moving_arm(Arm, _, _, _, _), ll_gripping(Arm, _), ll_releasing(Arm)],
  [],
  [ll_arm(Arm), pos(X1, Y1), pos(X2, Y2)],
  [
    del(ll_arm_at(Arm, X1, Y1)),
    add(ll_moving_arm(Arm, X1, Y1, X2, Y2))
  ]
).

ll_action(ll_move_arm_end(Arm, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [ll_moving_arm(Arm, X1, Y1, X2, Y2)],
  [],
  [],
  [],
  [
    del(ll_moving_arm(Arm, X1, Y1, X2, Y2)),
    add(ll_arm_at(Arm, X2, Y2))
  ]
).

ll_action(ll_grip_start(Arm),
  [ll_gripper(Arm, open)],
  [ll_moving_arm(Arm, _, _, _, _), ll_gripping(Arm, _), ll_releasing(Arm)],
  [],
  [ll_gripper(Arm)],
  [
    del(ll_gripper(Arm, open)),
    add(ll_gripping(Arm))
  ]
).

ll_action(ll_grip_end(Arm),
  [ll_gripping(Arm)],
  [],
  [],
  [ll_gripper(Arm)],
  [
    del(ll_gripping(Arm)),
    add(ll_gripper(Arm, close))
  ]
).

ll_action(ll_release_start(Arm),
  [ll_gripper(Arm, close)],
  [ll_moving_arm(Arm, _, _, _, _), ll_gripping(Arm, _), ll_releasing(Arm)],
  [],
  [ll_gripper(Arm)],
  [
    del(ll_gripper(Arm, close)),
    add(ll_releasing(Arm))
  ]
).

ll_action(ll_release_end(Arm),
  [ll_releasing(Arm)],
  [],
  [],
  [ll_gripper(Arm)],
  [
    del(ll_releasing(Arm)),
    add(ll_gripper(Arm, open))
  ]
).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% mappings
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%mapping for moving a block from a table to another position on the table.
mapping(move_table_to_table_start(Agent, Block, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_grip_start(Agent),
    ll_grip_end(Agent),
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_release_start(Agent),
    ll_release_end(Agent)
  ]
).

%mapping for moving a block from a table to the top of another block.
mapping(move_table_to_block_start(Agent, Block1, Block2, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_grip_start(Agent),
    ll_grip_end(Agent),
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_release_start(Agent),
    ll_release_end(Agent)
  ]
).

%mapping for moving a block from the top of another block to a position on the table.
mapping(move_onblock_to_table_start(Agent, Block1, Block2, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_release_start(Agent),
    ll_release_end(Agent),
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_grip_start(Agent),
    ll_grip_end(Agent)
  ]
).

%mapping for moving a block from the top of another block to another block.
mapping(move_onblock_to_block_start(Agent, Block1, Block2, Block3, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
  [
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, 0, 0, X1, Y1),
    ll_release_start(Agent),
    ll_release_end(Agent),
    ll_move_arm_start(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_move_arm_end(Agent, X1, Y1, X2, Y2),
    ll_grip_start(Agent),
    ll_grip_end(Agent)
  ]
).
